constraint.cypher: MATCH (pluginProject:JQA:PluginProject)-[:CREATES]->(artifact:Java:Artifact) WITH artifact MATCH (cli:Maven:Project { artifactId: 'jqassistant.scm.cli'}) -[:HAS_EFFECTIVE_MODEL]->(model:Maven:Pom) WHERE NOT((model)-[:DECLARES_DEPENDENCY]->(artifact)) RETURN artifact.group, artifact.name
